headers.subject: [tosdr:2100] Your personal information may be shared with other Microsoft services

html:
In order to offer you a more consistent and personalized experience in your interactions with Microsoft, information collected through one Microsoft service may be combined with information obtained through other Microsoft services. 

 

From <http://www.microsoftstore.com/store/msca/en_CA/DisplayPrivacyPage/ThemeID.27659600/> 

--

subject: Your personal information may be shared with other Microsoft services
text:
